  • public class Game3Tests
extends java.lang.Object
    Since:
    2015-11-02 Handles the tests for game 3
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Brendan, David, Danielle, Zhanglong and Huayu

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void testAddPlant()
      Test 1: Tests the addition of a plant to a row and column Test 2: Tests the addition of a plant to a different row and column
      void testAddRunoff()
      Test 1: Tests the addition of runoff to a row and column Test 2: Tests the addition of runoff to a different row and column
      void testBattle()
      Tests the fighting of plants and runoff 3 times First time tests the result of one fight Second time tests the death of the runoff Third time tests the death of the plant
      void testEndGame()
      Tests the passing of the score to the overall game Tests that the function alerts the big game that this game was completed Tests that the function makes the big game start running
      void testonClick()
      4 main tests Test 1: Tests to see that planting plants works Test 2: Tests planting at another plant Test 3: Tests the player clicking on a mussel for money Test 4: Tests the plater exiting the game
      void testOnClick() 
      void testUpdate()
      Tests that the game properly causes the runoff to move and the score and money to update
